value:
Reyson, Leanne... All have
blessed me. I pray for this
happiness to continue.

Queen Nailah is naturally beautiful,
but it's her kindness and refinement
from within that radiate most of all.

I shall never take flight again, but I still
have my voice. I hope my songs can
reverberate throughout the world.

The kindness everyone has shown
me... I am continuously moved
to tears.

I'm inspired to sing a song of
good fortune for the future of
these brides and grooms.

I come bearing a wedding invitation
from $Nf.
Do not fret, I'm in good spirits today.

Thank you. I can feel this new
strength flowing through me.

My name is Rafiel, a heron and
survivor of the Serenes kingdom.$k$pI came here at behest of the one I
love and owe my life to.

Thank you for inviting me here. Askr
is a wonderful place filled with caring
people, $Nu.$k$pAfter the Serenes Massacre, I trudged
through the desert in agony believing
my entire clan had been wiped out...$k$pI had lost my ability to fly, but Queen
Nailah offered me her hand, and with
that, I pledged my life to her.$k$pAnd now here, I reunited with my
brother and sister and will partake in
the lively wedding festivites.$k$pMy power may pale in comparison to
other Heroes, but I'll give all I am to
preserve the harmony of Askr.
Have you seen my bride? She must look very beautiful...
After I lost everything, my queen restored my hope.
I hope that my brother and sister each find themselves in wedding attire in their turn.
You may say that this is a simple festival... but in this attire,  I am as nervous as a groom!
Receiving your blessing on this fine day makes me happy indeed.
